column1: a swish and miss. Full and wide floater outside off. Rahul reaches out for the drive, expecting that to swing back in. It's gone straight on
full and just outside off, hangs back a touch this time. Half a stride, opens the face for the drive and gets it between point and backward. Again, no swing
full and just outside off, a neat driving length. And a neat drive off the front foot, but straight to mid-off
pull the length back a touch and stays in the corridor. Rahul's half stride catches him a little short of this. Watchfully poked into the covers off the thick outside edge
full and a hint of bend inwards into the corridor. Opens the face and drives to cover point
good length and swung into middle stump, clipped to deep square from the crease
good length and across off stump, stays leg side of that and slashes on the rise to backward point
good length and in the corridor. Opens the wrists and steers this drive to third man's left
good length and sliding onto the pads. Looks to whip that over short fine, cops it on the thigh
short of a length at middle stump, jumps down at that to open up the covers. Under-edges the attempted slap
short and rising steeply in the corridor. Arches back to create room for the upper cut. That's quickly past him
good length and at off stump, steers to backward point off the back foot
good length and just outside off, driven on the rise to extra cover
full and just outside off, looks to force that through the covers off the front foot. Bat turns in the hand and it ends up in the leg side

miscued but third man is up. Full and just outside off. Goes with hard hands again. This time trying to loft it over the cover region. The bat turns once again in his hands, the face opens, and this slice ends up wide of short third man
yorker length just outside off, jabbed into the point region

knocks out off stump with a trademark delivery! He's back. Starc is back. High 140s, outswinger starting middle and curving viciously towards off. Dhawan's got his front leg in the leg side and his stumps exposed as he creates room for the drive through cover. The late swing and the pace does him and it's a pretty sight as the stumps is tonked
full and very wide outside off. Searching for that swing, but this is past the tramline. Kohli lets it go
full and just outside off, waits on that, gets into a crouch and opens the face to steer this to third man
good length on middle stump, shuffles and clips to deep square
good length outside off, opens the face to steer towards third man. Smith at backward point can't gather cleanly to his left and Kohli calls Rahul through
squares him. Good length, off stump, swung away from the outside edge. Kohli had to try and adjust his angled bat, but that was quickly past him
whippage. Backs into the leg side and gets this over midwicket. Good length and into his bod as he backs away. Gets his wrists under the bounce of this and launches over the infield
short at off stump, drops it into the covers with soft hands
good length and marginal shape away in the corridor. Allows it on and runs it to deep point's left
drilled through the covers. A flat, overpitched ball outside off. Front leg out of the way for a full, clean swing through the line A cover drive that's pierced the infield
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
goodly, at a length and turning into middle stump. Gets deep in the crease and whips it to long-on's right
pushed through full and flat at leg stump, steps out to meet it on the full and gently pats it in front of long-on to steal a run
good length outside off, steps out and drives to extra cover
good length on middle stump, pushed down the pitch off the front foot
good length on middle stump, turns it into midwicket off the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, jumps out and opens up the off side. Can only pat it towards sweeper cover
leading edge floats over short third and point. Good length delivery slanted into middle stump. Wants to bring out his pick-up shot behind square on the leg side. Closes the face too early

slaughtered! Whew. He has picked the length so quickly on this. It's short of a length. He's got a front foot press but quickly springs back up as the ball rises and then nails the pull on the up. Sweet, sweet sound
high full toss at middle stump, patted hurriedly into the leg side
yorker at off stump, jams it out, towards mid-off
dropped short at middle stump, spanked off the back foot, flat and on the bounce to deep midwicket
dropped short again, and this time it sticks in the pitch. A googly. Allows Rahul to swivel and place his pull between deep square and deep midwicket
short and turning away, wide outside off. Pulled along the ground to long-on

balloons back to the bowler. The only thing going for Swepson this ball is that it has gripped. It's short but it's gripped and turned away and gotten big on Kohli in the corridor. He's shaping to pull but checks himself and it pops back gently to the bowler off the leading edge
short and turning away outside off, chopped to sweeper cover off the back foot
short of a length and turning outside off. Gets deep and on top of the bounce to turn this to deep midwicket with soft hands
good length on leg stump, leans in and clips to into the leg side
good length on off stump, leans in and flicks to long-on
good length and sliding onto leg stump. Deep in the crease to pat that towards deep midwicket
full on off stump, check-drive towards long-on
good length and sliding on at off stump. Gets forward and this pings off the thick inside edge
full and just outside off, poked into the covers
pumped over deep midwicket! Bona fide six hitter. Don't bowl short to this guy as a spinner. It's sitting up nicely at an off stump line and he's back for the big pull
good length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length and sliding onto leg stump, back in the crease to clips to deep square
googly, short and low and down leg side. Slides into his pads as he looks for the whip through midwicket
slapped to deep midwicket's left. Swepson still struggling with his length. Short and at the stumps, lines it up nicely and pulls firmly between long-on and deep midwicket
short of a length at middle, onto the back foot to punch to long-on
short and just outside off, mistimed cut to point
full and just outside off, a pretty, flowing drive along the floor to long-off
full outside off, driven firmly to long-off
good length on leg stump, flicks to fine leg's left
short of a length outside off, shapes to force that through cover, ends up turning it into midwicket with a closed face
full and wide outside off, leans in and drives to sweeper cover
full at off stump, driven sweetly to mid-off
power over the off side! Short of a length outside off, Samson jumps into a lofted square cover drive and sends it wide of the sweeper
angled into the pads, tucked into midwicket
full at the toes, clipped to deep square leg and takes him to a 37-ball half-century
slips this full down the leg side
angled into leg stump again, nudged towards deep square and they race back for a second...Samson has to get the dive out
a flick of the wrists into midwicket. Good over for India
straight to cover! Full outside off, was in the slot for the drive, but Samson couldn't have picked out the fielder on the edge of the ring with any more precision
full at off stump, pushed into the covers
a yorker at off stump, 126kph, well bowled and all he can do is dig it out
full outside off, touch slower at 117kph, played into the covers
makes decent connection on this one, the bottom hand comes through the drive and sends it in the air straight down the ground
loses his line down the leg side so a bonus ball for India
back on a full length outside off, 117, and it's bunted back to him...well bowled by Henriques
tapped into the off side
a googly, full outside off, he didn't pick that and it squirts into midwicket
tucked into midwicket and it's another dot ball
good catch at short third man! Hazlewood does well to get down to that. Pandey went back to a slightly shorter ball, goes for the cut, it takes the top edge and is dipping as it reaches Hazlewood
drives a low full toss down to long-on
good length, at middle, played into the on side and that's an over with a wicket and just two runs
short of a length outside off, goes back and across then defends on his toes
follows it up with a yorker, 124kph, which is jabbed down the pitch...this has been exceptional from Henriques
goes across the crease and takes this from outside off but straight to midwicket...three dots in a row
short of a length, gets himself into a tangle here as he looks to pull, hammers into Pandya's hip and loops away. That will be painful

terrific catch at long-on! Rahul has lost the strike and now lost his wicket. The pressure has told in these middle overs, Rahul trying to break the shackles but can't get the distance down the ground. Abbott runs in and takes the catch diving forward
short of a length at middle and leg, shoved into the leg side
comes forward and drives wide of cover
starts to move outside leg but then comes back into line and drives to long-off
worked off the pads but straight to short fine leg
comes down the pitch and drives strongly to long-off but only a single which won't hurt Australia
short of a length, punched off the back foot to deep cover
full outside off, drives to cover and he finishes with a dot ball
short at the body, pulled towards fine leg
that's close! Moves across his crease and then misses his whip, the ball travels over middle stump
back of a length, straight, worked into the leg side
gives himself room outside leg, drives a good length delivery straight to mid-off but the throw misses...he was gone with a direct hit by Abbott
drives a delivery off the stumps to long-on
back of a length, opens the face and dabs towards short third man...bit of a fumble from Zampa and they are alert to the chance of the second
into the stands! Pandya had changed his bat before that ball and this one is working nicely. Full outside off, he's able to get underneath and swings high and mighty over long-on
short outside off, crunched powerful towards cover where Finch does well to intercept
short outside off, driven wide of cover but the sweeper keeps them to a single

Abbott saves a six with a palm back! Almost a fantastic catch, but he couldn't flick it back up as we see so often now. Pandya launched it towards long-on, not quite with the distance needed. Abbott leaped on the rope and did very well
high...very high, and taken at long-off! Pandya is cut off before he can really get going, gets all height on this one, low down on the bat, Smith has plenty of time to get underneath it
short outside off, square drives to deep point
big full toss which is mistimed into the leg side
another full toss, sprayed down the leg side, Wade gets a glove on it
worked down the ground towards long-on
full toss at the stumps, whipped to deep midwicket
inside edge past leg stump...again this didn't pitch, it's 148kph, Sundar swings to the leg side and gets an edge between his legs
gets this one on target, a yorker at off stump, drilled straight down the ground
a wide yorker outside off, Sundar plays over the top of it
great shot! Full, wide outside off, allows Jadeja to free his arms into a flowing, powerful cover drive which bisects mid-off and cover who are both inside the ring
similar stroke, but the ball was a touch wider and he had to reach of it...picks out cover on the ring
goes down on his back knee and slog sweeps over midwicket, superb work on the boundary as Smith gets across from long-on and keeps it in play...but it's a no-ball!
back of a length outside off, one hand comes off the bat as he swings to the leg side and it comes off a top edge...lack of timing allows a second
that's MASSIVE! Full outside off, Jadeja picks it up and swings it miles back over deep square leg. Almost onto the root of the stand
drags the length back, he pulls and gets it just over square leg...he's in pain, but doing some damage here
full, wide outside off, crunched through the off side! All along the ground, this pinged off the middle and into the gap
gets the yorker in, dug out into the leg side and Jadeja can barely move
dropped! Henriques at backward point...short of a length, Jadeja gets a top edge into his helmet and it loops towards backward point. Think Henriques misjudged it slightly
straight to long-on...couldn't get the distance on it and a comfortable catch
wide of long-on! A fiercely struck lofted punch straight down the ground...Abbott almost made the ground across, but was out of reach
goes short, and gets hammered! What a finish by Jadeja. Starc dragged it down, not sure if on purpose, Jadeja latched on and pulls it through the leg side
gets the yorker in to finish, inside edge into the boot and they manage the single
good length and swung into the pads, gets on his toes and clips it to fine leg
short of a length outside off, gets behind the line of that and just swipes it through midwicket as he jumps up to ride the bounce
short of a length outside off, walks down at it and cuts out the inswinger's path. It sits up nicely and he slaps it wide of mid-off
good length and into the pads, looks for the flick and cops it on the pad
lovely connection. Walks down at this inswinger outside off, meets it at the pitch and gets a nice straight bat down and drills it past the non-striker
good length and in the corridor, hangs deep in the crease and is beaten on the outside edge
short of a length and cramping him at the stumps. Backs away and cuts straight to cover
short and turning into the body. Backs away and cuts to cover
short of a length and turning into the body, can't get bat on this as it approaches the front pad
misfield by Dhawan. Short of a length and into off stump, backs away and punches to mid-off's left. Dhawan covers the ground but lets that through
short of a length and skidding onto middle stump, looks to swipe that behind square. It's a quicker one that hits him on the thigh
'oh you're kidding me', shouts Finch as he cuts a short and wide ball straight to backward point. It was the room he was looking to make all over
good length and into off stump, tapped into the covers off the back foot
short and wide outside off, waits on that and it slides on nicely as he gets on top and taps it on its head. Cut past point
full and a lot of width outside off. Short stands tall, reaches out, and drills that through the covers
length and just outside off, opens the face and runs it down towards third man
good length and just outside off. Plants the front leg across to try and play the pick up shot behind square. Cops it on the pad
low full toss down leg side, looks to whip that away, but cops that on the pad. Shami appeals for lbw but that might not even have struck in line
dropped short and turning into middle stump, backs away and slaps it well in front of deep midwicket off the back foot
short of a length and slides it into the body from around the wicket. Cops that in the mid-riff as he gets back for the pull
short of a length and into leg stump, jabbed to deep square off the back foot
good length and middle stump, mistimed sweep to square leg
short and at off stump, backs away and punches to mid-off's left
short and just outside off. Backs away and gets a nice pace on this to carve it behind point
length and just outside off, jabbed into the off side
oh cleeean. Full and into the pads. Finch hangs right back in the crease, and this is all hands from there. The perfect closing of the wrists and the bat face and he lifts the over deep square
slower short ball outside off, under-edge on the attempted cut
good length at the stumps, backs away and punches to mid-off's right
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
short of a length outside off, punched into the covers off the back foot
full and into middle stump, driven to mid-on
full and just outside off, backs away and drives to mid-off's right
inside edge fine. He's around the wicket, sliding this into the corridor as Finch backs into the leg side for the drive through cover. It's skidded back in with the angle
full and into middle stump, backs away and drives to long-on
slower short ball outside off, cuts straight to backward point

dropped at backward point. Manish Pandey flying to his right. Gets two hands on it but loses it when he's on the way down. It's a length ball outside off, Finch slashes at that. You count on Pandey to hold on to these sort of chances, but it was a difficult ask

dropped at cover! Virat Kohli puts down a sitter. A short ball getting steep at a middle stump line. Short backs away and has a hack as it gets big on him. Skies it high. Kohli has ages to get under it. By the time the ball comes down, he's arching backwards and has the reverse cup. Bursts through him
good length on off stump, patted into the covers
good length and into the pads. Can't get his attempted glance away
good length and angled in from outside off. Looks to slash through cover but the angle is against him. This rolls back to the bowler
carved to sweeper cover on the bounce. Full on off stump, backs into the leg side and drives inside-out
full and just outside off, driven back firmly to the bowler, on the bounce
good length outside, looks to hammer that through cover. Ends up slicing feebly to sweeper

oh sensational catch from Pandya! This will grate on Australia, no doubt. The concussion sub has a wicket. And it's a good ball. Lobbed up at off stump, full and dipping. Finch backs away looking to go over extra cover. Ends up slicing it because he's not to the pitch. Pandya then sprints some 20 yards to his left from long-off, composes himself briefly and then springs out, full stretch, to pluck this just as it threatens to plonk into the turf. Puts in a nice slide to hold on to it too
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
short of a length and turning into leg stump, gets deep in the crease and clips it to deep midwicket
slower short ball outside off, mistimed pull into midwicket
good length on off stump, gets deep in the crease and clips to deep square
short of a length outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
beaten on the inside edge. A lovely knuckle ball. Smith wants the big drive on the up through cover, the ball sticks in the pitch and bisects bat and off stump
slapped over square leg. Another slower one, but it's short and sitting up at middle stump. He hangs deep in the crease, gets the hip rotation going and nails the connection
short at middle stump, pulled on the bounce to deep square
good length at off stump, steps out and is beaten in flight. Stabs into the covers
length at off stump, steps out and drills firmly and flat at long-on. Taken on the bounce
good length and sliding on outside off. Gets down low and into the off side to paddle this fine
short of a length and wide outside off, mistimed cut to backward point

Samson you stunner! Oh boy! We saw a good one from Pandya earlier but this was, by some degree, a harder one. It's flat, it's dipping, it's absolutely laced across the line. Samson runs in from deep midwicket, staying low at every point and then dives to pick it up low and in front of himself. That took so much hurried movement that he absolutely had to nail the follow through as well to hold on - and he does that with the most graceful tumble. Superb. A slog across the line that Smith got good connection on
just wide of long-off! A googly, good length and outside off. Maxwell checks his attempted drive and ends up lofting it gently
driven into the covers
edged, just short of the keeper! Length ball, angled across, Maxwell pushes at it and gets a healthy nick but it lands just in front of the Rahul's gloves

huge appeal for lbw! And Kohli has reviewed almost before the ball stops rolling away. Where did it pitch? Was smashing the stumps for sure. Maxwell playing back to a short of a length delivery. Beaten for pace. We have a small delay waiting for ball tracking. And now the pitch map is missing from the replay. Here it comes...it's pitched in line and it's hitting off stump.
full at the stumps, Henriques caught a little on the crease but is able to play it through midwicket
worked off the pads backward of square and Short is quick between the wickets
short of a length, angling in, flicked to deep square leg
round the wicket, short outside off, no timing as he cuts it into the pitch and it dribbles away square
comes across onto off stump and sweeps a to deep square
tapped onto midwicket
full at middle and leg, driven to long-on
deflects off the pad to short fine leg as he misses the pull...was a short ball, he missed out
right across onto off stump again, another sweep, he misses but the pad is outside the line
cracking shot! That flew off the bat. Just short of a length from Shami and Henriques pulls it flat over deep square leg
full outside off, a punchy drive to deep cover
gives himself room outside leg but can't get any timing as he drives on the up to mid-off
worked down the ground to long-on
width outside off, square drives through point
steps to leg again, back of a length delivery, can't beat mid-off inside the circle
comes down the pitch, this is pushed wider outside off, reaches out and drives to long-off
goes back in the crease and taps back down the pitch
that's a top shot! He made that delivery look wider than it was, just allowed himself a fraction of room, drove it wide of point
done in the air this time...but is able to change the shot and pop it in the air over the off side
full at the stumps, played from deep in the crease into the on side
wide outside off, he misses the cut and gets the wide call...Kohli isn't impressed
pushed across outside off, short of a length, Short tries a reverse scoop and doesn't make contact as the pressure grows on him
mistimes this just over the outstretched hands of the bowler, the bat twisted in his hands...was a slower ball, through the shot early
good yorker, dug out down the ground and long-on keeps them to a single
short outside off, leans back and cuts to point...and it becomes five runs where the throw at the stumps escapes the backing up of Samson. Would have been out with a direct hit
worked into the on side
top yorker, jabbed into the off side...this has been impressive
finds long-on! He tried to go big, but can't get the distance. Full outside off, Short picked it up, it's a cross-seamer, comes from low down on the bat and it's a comfortable catch
this grips and turns, Wade squared up as he defends
goes for a reverse sweep and is taken on the arm
flicked from outside off to deep midwicket and that's a very well judged second
goes for a big slog sweep and doesn't connect, beats the bottom edge...another dot
full at off stump, driven down to long-off
can't beat point but he's just able to abort the run in time and get back. Excellent finish from Sundar
works a straight ball backward of square on the leg side
sweeps this time, off around middle and off, to deep square
comes down the pitch, it's well bowled, fuller and wider, all he can do is push it square towards point
drags a slog sweep from outside off, takes a top edge but lands short of deep midwicket
full outside off, timed the drive nicely but straight to the very straight deep cover
another top edge, taken at deep midwicket! Pushed wide outside off again, Wade has to reach for it, opts to sweep again and picks out Kohli. India closing in.
a slower ball, short outside off, cut into the off side
back of a length outside off, steered to the cover sweeper
full outside off, drives wide of mid-off but can't find the boundary

given lbw! The bowler didn't even appeal. Henriques has reviewed. He moved right across the crease, aiming to the leg side, it looked pretty straight. Only the keeper appealed. No bat involved. Another wait for the ball tracking to be put together. Smashing leg stump
width outside off, slices a drive over point
short at off stump, he's through the shot too early, loops through the keeper
base of off stump! That's how to do it. Full, straight, Starc misses and Natarajan hits
full outside off, was that edged?! Rahul didn't take it cleanly...toe end straight into the ground
driven down to long-off
wide outside off, shapes to play a scoop but is well beaten
connects well! Length ball, Abbott heaves across the line and clears deep midwicket. First boundary since 14th over
swung down the ground
gets across to off stump and scoops this miles into the air back over the keeper
full outside off, gives himself some room but it's just a toe end
beaten by a full delivery outside off as he gives himself room
full at middle, driven to the covers
all the way! That's a clean strike by Swepson as he clears long-off
and another boundary, gives himself room and drives over cover, but the game was already gone
